title: Implement parse_files and parse_directory
description: Implement parse_files() to sort paths, iterate calling parse_file(), merge graphs, and return MultiFileGraph. Implement parse_directory() to call discover_python_files() and delegate to parse_files(). (Epic 5, Tasks 3+4)

title: Implement discover_files() function with gitignore support
close_reason: Implemented discovery.rs module with discover_files() and discover_python_files(). Added gitignore-aware filtering including parent directory checking. Returns absolute paths via canonicalize(). All 5 unit tests + 1 integration test pass.

title: Create CLI crate
description:
Task 1.3: Create crates/cli/Cargo.toml depending on core and clap with derive feature. Use clap derive macro (\#[derive(Parser)]) in main.rs with \#[command(version = "0.1.0")] to handle --version automatically. This establishes CLI pattern for future commands.

See: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Add tests for Python parser
description: Create test-fixtures/sample.py, add unit test to verify extraction of functions and classes

title: Verify build and run
description:
Task 1.4: Run cargo build, cargo test, cargo run -- --version to verify everything works.

See: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Create test fixtures for calls (basic, unresolved, edge cases)
Create discovery.rs module
close_reason: Implemented discovery.rs module with discover_files() and discover_python_files(). Added gitignore-aware filtering including parent directory checking. Returns absolute paths via canonicalize(). All 5 unit tests + 1 integration test pass.

title: Create test fixture directory for discovery tests
close_reason: Created test fixture at crates/core/tests/test-fixtures/discovery-project/ with src/main.py, tests/test_main.py, setup.py, venv/lib.py, and .gitignore containing 'venv/'

title: Add glob and ignore dependencies to Cargo.toml
close_reason: Added glob=0.3, ignore=0.4 to dependencies and tempfile=3 to dev-dependencies. Versions match latest (glob 0.3.3, ignore 0.4.25, tempfile 3.24.0). Build verified.

title: Write test suite for multi-file parsing
description: Write unit tests (single-file, multi-file, duplicates, edges, node_locations, file_nodes, deterministic merging) and integration test with multi-file fixture. Verify same-name functions in different files remain distinct. (Epic 5, Tasks 5+6)

title: Write integration test for file discovery
close_reason: Implemented discovery.rs module with discover_files() and discover_python_files(). Added gitignore-aware filtering including parent directory checking. Returns absolute paths via canonicalize(). All 5 unit tests + 1 integration test pass.

title: Add tree-sitter dependencies
description: Add tree-sitter and tree-sitter-python to crates/core/Cargo.toml

title: Add Graph API methods (edges and edge_endpoints)
Add MultiFileGraph structure
description: Create MultiFileGraph struct with graph, node_locations (HashMap<NodeId, PathBuf>), and file_nodes (HashMap<PathBuf, NodeIndex>) fields. Implement new() constructor and add HashMap imports. Add doc comments explaining each field's purpose. (Epic 5, Task 1)

title: Initialize cargo workspace
description:
Task 1.1: Create root Cargo.toml with workspace definition, add workspace dependencies (petgraph, serde, anyhow), create crates/ directory.

See: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Write unit tests for file discovery
close_reason: Implemented discovery.rs module with discover_files() and discover_python_files(). Added gitignore-aware filtering including parent directory checking. Returns absolute paths via canonicalize(). All 5 unit tests + 1 integration test pass.

title: Epic 1: Workspace & Foundation
description:
Set up minimal two-crate workspace (cli + core) with placeholder graph structures.

Architecture: docs/plans/2025-01-20-modular-folder-structure.md
Implementation plan: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Verify Epic 2 tests still pass (backward compatibility)
Implement Python parser module
description: Create parser/mod.rs with Language enum and Parser struct. Create python.rs with parse_file() function using manual tree walking

title: Epic 2: Python Parsing via Tree-sitter
description:
Validate tree-sitter can parse Python code and extract functions/classes into graph nodes. Uses manual tree walking (no helper crates). Single file only, no edges yet.

Architecture: docs/plans/2025-01-20-modular-folder-structure.md
Implementation: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic2-python-parsing.md

title: Create core crate with basic graph types
description:
Task 1.2: Create crates/core/Cargo.toml, lib.rs with module declarations, graph.rs with Node/Edge/Graph types, empty parser/mod.rs and queries.rs.

See: docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Epic 4: File Discovery
close_reason: Epic 4 complete: File discovery module with gitignore-aware filtering. Generic API (discover_files) supports multi-language future. Returns absolute paths. All tests pass (5 unit + 1 integration).

title: Implement calls edge extraction from tree-sitter AST
Add documentation for multi-file parsing
description: Add doc comments to MultiFileGraph, doc examples to parse_files() and parse_directory(), document two-pass design intent, and document NodeId format (file_path::symbol_name). (Epic 5, Task 7)

title: Implement discover_python_files() convenience wrapper
close_reason: Implemented discovery.rs module with discover_files() and discover_python_files(). Added gitignore-aware filtering including parent directory checking. Returns absolute paths via canonicalize(). All 5 unit tests + 1 integration test pass.

title: Epic 5: Multi-File Parsing (Graph Merging)
description: Parse multiple Python files and merge their graphs into a unified MultiFileGraph with provenance tracking. Implement Pass 1 of two-pass architecture for Epic 7's import resolution. Design finalized in docs/plans/2025-01-21-epic5-multi-file-parsing.md

title: Write unit tests for calls edges
Implement graph merging logic
description: Add merge_file_graph() method to MultiFileGraph. Implement node deduplication by ID (first occurrence wins), edge index remapping using HashMap tracking, and populate node_locations and file_nodes during merge. (Epic 5, Task 2)
